<div class="content-narrow">

The International Herbarium Spectral Digitization Working Group (IHerbSpec) is a global consortium advancing the collection and use of reflectance spectra from herbarium specimens to advance integrative plant biology and biodiversity science.

With a protocol now established to enable the harmonization of spectral datasets through standardized measurement workflows, metadata schema, and data-sharing practices, our focus is on advancing collaborative team science that connects institutions, disciplines, and communities.

</div>
:::
